welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Konstancin-Jeziorna, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and relaxing spa resorts. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warsaw Babice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo shipments at Warsaw Babice Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
